domain.name: Multimedia Franchise
domain.description: Franchises which span multiple forms of media like 'Harry Potter'

entity.name: Persona
entity.description:
This entity includes all conversation about the franchise, as well as any individual installments in the series.

The Video Game domain query only tracks conversation about the game series whereas the Multimedia Franchise query contains all Persona conversation.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

entity.name: Persona
entity.description:
This entity includes all conversation about the franchise, as well as any individual installments in the series.

The Video Game domain query only tracks conversation about the game series whereas the Multimedia Franchise query contains all Persona conversation.

text:
@MirrorBreaking_ I suspect it's not #coronavirus with @BorisJohnson 

As the daily Conservative shambles unfolds it's looking more like #chickenpox!

The bumbling idiot persona doesn't play well in a national crisis so our PM had gone into hiding!

#clapforkeyworkers #PPEforNHS #COVID19Pandemic
